description: Next.js project, it's a Netflix Clone project where you can access reviews of movies. You have to create an account and log in to access the data. I discovered how to use Next Auth, Prisma and MongoDB. All the data come from an API named 'The Movie Database'. I used Next Router to navigate between the different pages and tailwind for styling, obviously.
React project, it's a recipes website. All the data come from an API named 'Spoonacular'. I used React Router to navigate between the different pages and styled-components for styling, obviously.
Website from Scratch for a plane rent enterprise. My first customer project. The website has been made with React, react-router, CSS modules. I also send the form by mail with Emailjs.

My own portfolio, made by me, from scratch. I initialized the project with Vite.js, then I developped the Front-End in HTML, SCSS. I used JavaScript and JSON to display my projects.Finally I made the choice of Emailjs so I can receive the form directly in my Mail Box.

Website from Scratch. Here is my graduation project. The point here, was to make a responsive, dynamic website using the 5 languages learned at school with a Front-End and Back-End part. We also had to create an Admin who could access the database.
Project from Scratch. My job was to fetch and use the data of an API, Pokemon API. I used the data to make a Pokedex with informations about the pokemons.
Project from Scratch. Fetching the date of the API "OpenMeteo" and using them to make a weather app. It allowed me to make calls to an API and manipulate the DOM.

Project from Scratch. Users come from an Api API, "RandomUsers" API, then we create a table of users. We also add a search nav to find our users by their name. I discovered Typescript in this challenge.
Project from Scratch. Discovery of Three.js to use 3D objects. We can see here a rotating sphere, we can manually make it turn.
